about_the_game:
NOTE: This DLC is primarily for those who wish to support the game and its small team of developers' livelihoods. All other swag included is just a bonus!

Support the developers of We Need To Go Deeper with your purchase of the Support Pack! Like any real philanthropist, you will don only the humblest, most tasteful of swag to show off your supporting and charitable ways. Exclusive cosmetics such as:

  • Gold Character Skins!
  • Gold-Plated Dollar Sign Goggles!
  • Money Suit (with Gold Chain)!
  • A Ham-Leaf Clover Pet!

In addition to this tasteful swag, you will also get access to:

  • 3 Original Early Prototypes from We Need To Go Deeper's early days! (Windows Executables) Of historical interest only. They're terrible. Found in a DLC folder in your install location entitled "Support Pack Extras"
  • The developers' love and appreciation!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2450M Processor (3M Cache, up to 3.10 GHz) or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000 or better

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or Later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2450M Processor (3M Cache, up to 3.10 GHz) or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
